entry.content:

entry.title: New release for Peppermint: 0.5.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • UI bug fixes
  • switched from "ticket" to "issue"
  • Start of themes, mixture of light & dark -> more to come
  • docker image optimisation -> 2.9gb to 1.4gb
  • various ui improvements across mobile and desktop
  • fixed build error
  • fixed redirect to ticket not found

entry.title: New release for Peppermint: 0.5.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: OIDC authentication support
  • fix: issue titles caching between pages
  • fix: createdby added to portal tickets
  • fix: onboarding now only shows on first load
  • fix: improvements to dark mode
  • fix: mobile ui now inline with desktop
  • chore: icons updated
  • fix: mobile actions on tickets
  • Add default login to docker page by @SydneyWafflez in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/376
  • Add instructions for installing and using Certbot by @SydneyWafflez in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/377
  • Remove deprecated 'portal_locale' in seed by @dmeijboom in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/379

New Contributors

  • @SydneyWafflez made their first contribution in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/375
  • @dmeijboom made their first contribution in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/379

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/compare/0.5.1...0.5.2
